name: HBGary
overview: HBGary, Inc. develops and offers software security technologies to assess information risks in deployed applications. It offers risk mitigation solutions, which focus on corporate espionage and computer crime. The company develops Responder Platform, a software suite used to detect, diagnose, and respond to present computer threats. Its Responder Platform includes Responder Professional, a live memory and runtime analysis platform for Windows operating systems that facilitates information assurance analysts, computer emergency response teams, and computer crime investigators with the capabilities to collect, analyze, diagnose, and report on runtime data contained in physical memory; and Responder Field Edition, a platform that provides law enforcement and computer intrusion investigators with live Windows memory preservation and analysis capabilities. The company also enables clients to analyze captured malware for encryption routines, backdoor capabilities, command and control functions, exfiltration and covert channels, and bypass packing and anti-forensics layers. In addition, it provides investigation and incident response, and exploitation assessment services. Further, the company offers rootkit detection, incident response, malware reverse engineering, and computer forensics solutions. Furthermore, it provides training for memory analysis, incident response, and binary forensics. The companyâ€™s solutions monitor external and internal threats, including intellectual property, such as product designs, marketing plans, customer lists, and government intelligence. HBGary, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Sacramento, California with additional offices in Bethesda, Maryland; and El Dorado Hills, California, as well as sales offices in Washington D.C.
